domino.java.capsule

Interface CapsuleContext

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DynamicCapsuleContext, OsgiContext

    public interface CapsuleContext

    Represents the tree structure which is formed by capsule scopes and their contained capsules.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCapsule(Capsule capsule)
      Starts the given capsule and adds it to the current capsule scope.
      CapsuleScope executeWithinNewCapsuleScope(Runnable f)
      Creates a new capsule scope on top of the active one and executes the given function in it.

    • Method Detail

      • addCapsule

        void addCapsule(Capsule capsule)

        Starts the given capsule and adds it to the current capsule scope.

        Parameters:
        capsule - The capsule to add.

      • executeWithinNewCapsuleScope

        CapsuleScope executeWithinNewCapsuleScope(Runnable f)

        Creates a new capsule scope on top of the active one and executes the given function in it. So the function sees the new capsule scope as the current one.

        Parameters:
        f - The function which might add capsules to the new scope.
        Returns:
        The new scope.
